name: @robinmordasiewicz/f5xc-terraform-mcp
description: MCP server providing AI assistants with access to F5 Distributed Cloud Terraform provider documentation, 270+ OpenAPI specifications, subscription tier information, and addon service activation workflows.
long_description:
Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for F5 Distributed Cloud (F5XC) Terraform provider. Provides AI assistants with comprehensive access to:

- **Terraform Documentation**: Search, retrieve, and explore F5XC resources, data sources, functions, and guides
- **OpenAPI Specifications**: Query 270+ F5 Distributed Cloud API specs with endpoint discovery and schema definitions
- **Subscription Intelligence**: Check resource subscription tier requirements (STANDARD, ADVANCED, PREMIUM)
- **Addon Service Workflows**: List, check activation status, and get activation workflows for F5XC addon services
- **Metadata & Patterns**: Access validation patterns, oneof constraints, default values, and common configuration mistakes

Designed for infrastructure-as-code workflows, enabling intelligent Terraform configuration generation with subscription compliance and best practices built-in.

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_discover
tools.description: Discover available F5XC Terraform MCP tools with optional schema details for lazy loading and efficient tool selection

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_docs
tools.description: Search, get, or list F5XC Terraform provider documentation including resources, data sources, functions, and guides

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_api
tools.description: Query 270+ F5XC OpenAPI specifications - search specs, get definitions, find endpoints, and explore schema structures

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_subscription
tools.description: Check F5XC resource subscription tier requirements and property-level feature availability (STANDARD/ADVANCED/PREMIUM)

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_addon
tools.description: List F5XC addon services, check activation status, and retrieve activation workflows for self-service, partial, or managed addons

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_metadata
tools.description: Query resource metadata for deterministic Terraform generation - oneof constraints, validation patterns, defaults, enums, subscription tiers, dependencies, and common mistakes

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_auth
tools.description: Check authentication status, list/switch profiles, validate credentials, and generate Terraform provider configuration blocks

tools.name: f5xc_terraform_get_summary
tools.description: Get comprehensive summary of all available F5XC documentation, API specifications, and MCP server capabilities
